code: @Test public void shouldLoginUsingJwtBearerToken() {     final Limits limits = template.requestBody("salesforce:limits", null, Limits.class).     assertNotNull(limits). }

@Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     final CamelContext camelContext = super.createCamelContext().     final SalesforceComponent salesforce = new SalesforceComponent().     final SalesforceLoginConfig loginConfig = LoginConfigHelper.getLoginConfig().     assumeNotNull(loginConfig.getKeystore()).     assumeNotNull(loginConfig.getKeystore().getResource()).     // force authentication type to JWT     loginConfig.setType(AuthenticationType.JWT).     salesforce.setLoginConfig(loginConfig).     camelContext.addComponent("salesforce", salesforce).     return camelContext. }
